name: Techcello
overview:
techcello, a product company focused on the engineering layer, specializing on SaaS.

techcello’s SaaS development framework cellosaas, is delivered as a shrink wrapped product, with an unique proposition- No vendor lock-in, No hidden cost, No learning curve.

Using cellosaas you can develop, host and maintain your SaaS application anywhere. Developers can start building the business related features from day one. It saves 70% on the cost of custom development and maintenance.

Features such as Plumbing, Customization, Security, Administration, Management of Tenants, Users, subscription, Licensing, Metering etc. can be used without having to re-invent the wheel.

Cellosaas is an Application Development Framework available without Vendor lockin. Once you buy cellosaas, you are free to develop the business functionalities on top of it, either in-house or by outsourcing (near shore / offshore / tier-1 / tier 3).

You can host your application on your own dedicated hardware or in a shared hosting environment (Data centre) or with any cloud providers such as Amazon and Azure. You can maintain and upgrade your application yourself or using any vendor as cellosaas is built on standard technologies such as .Net and Java.

external_links.title: techcello releases cellosaas, an enterprise SaaS development framwork
